definitions.definition: In a disorderly state; chaotic ; disorderly.
examples: Jim ran his fingers through his messy brown hair.
definitions.label_groups: of a place, situation, person, etc

examples: He is the messiest person I've ever met.

definitions.definition: Difficult or unpleasant to deal with .
Argumentative , spreading spreading gossip , talking behind someone's back
examples: They keep starting fights with Sam, they're so messy .

main_definition: ( of a place, situation, person, etc ) In a disorderly state; chaotic ; disorderly.
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Prone to causing mess .
( of a situation ) Difficult or unpleasant to deal with .
( of a person ) Argumentative , spreading spreading gossip , talking behind someone's back
